GERMANY XEN WINDOWS 100Mbps VPS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Germany 100Mbps Xen Windows VPS runs on XEN Virtualisation provided with SolusVM Control Panel gives the Windows VPS to perform at a high standards with more reliability and scalability. Linux VPS are completely managed from the client control panel with option from start, stop, reboot and reinstallation with various OS Variants to choose from, these can be access at any instance of time. Windows VPS are provided with full root access and with flexible option to upgrade the vps at any instance.

These VPS are performance of a Dedicated Servers but at cost effective price. Inetwebhost provides VPS services which are excellent to host websites using Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal or Magento which requires more resources and stable network. Inetwebhost provides 6 different configurations Plans.
